deposit(uint256).details: to deposit StableCoin into StabilityPool this must be protected against a reentrant attack from the arbitrage

liquidate().details: liquidates vault, must be called from that vaultthis function does not provide an opportunity for a reentrancy attack even though it would make the arbitragefail because of the lowering of the stablecoin balance

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemReward().details: to withdraw collateral rewards earned after liquidationsthis function does not provide an opportunity for a reentrancy attack

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setVLENDAmountForRewards().details: sets total amount of VLEND to be rewarded (pays per minute until reaches the amount rewarded)

setVLENDPerMinute(uint256).details: sets amount of VLEND per minute for rewards

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: to withdraw StableCoin that was not spent if this function is called in a reentrantway during arbitrage  itwould skew the token allocation and must be protected against

devdoc.title: is used to liquidate vaults and reward depositors with collateral redeemed

liquidate().notice: must be called by the valid vault
